title: Fort Bowie National Historic Site: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        The visitor center will be closed Mondays and Tuesdays  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, The visitor center will be closed Mondays and Tuesdays  The Fort Bowie Visitor Center will be closed on Mondays and Tuesdays this summer. The park grounds and trails remain open from sunrise to sunset.
